text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-aspirin
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-bromfenac
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-celecoxib
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-diclofenac
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-diflunisal
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-etodolac
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-fenoprofen
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-flurbiprofen
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-ibuprofen
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-indomethacin
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-ketoprofen
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-ketorolac
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-mefenamate
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-meloxicam
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-nabumetone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-naproxen
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-nepafenac
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-oxaprozin
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-piroxicam
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-sulindac
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-tolmetin

name: Valueset_NSAIDS
title: Nonsteroidal Anti-inflammatory Drugs Value Set
description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Nonsteroidal Anti-inflammatory Drug class (id: N0000175722).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)
purpose: Provide NSAID class terminology for PDDI CDS FHIR resources
